movie.title: The Poseidon Adventure
movie.plot: A cruise ship succumbs to a terrorist act and capsizes on New Year's eve. A rag-tag group of survivors, spearheaded by a priest and a homeland security agent, must journey through the upside down vessel and attempt an escape.

events.title: a group of passengers escape the capsized Poseidon
passengers board the Poseidon for a Christmas cruise
